channel.title: Posts on Warm journeys of bits and bytes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Warm journeys of bits and bytes

item.title: How did I build this website?
item.description: Hugo is a static HTML and CSS website generator written in Go. It is optimized for speed, ease of use, and configurability. Hugo takes a directory with content and templates and renders them into a full HTML website. I chose Hugo to this blog and store it in github as a static page. First I install hugo with brew then create 2 seperate github repository; one for all the source codes and the other for staic files in public folder.
